enumDescriptions.UserDefined: CLI with user defined keystroke sequences

LenovoSerialInterfaceProperties.description: This is the schema definition for Oem Lenovo Serial Interface resource. It represents the additional properties of a serial interface of a System.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

EnterCLIKeySequence.description: The key sequence to exit serial redirection and enter CLI.
EnterCLIKeySequence.longDescription: When the exit key sequence is typed, serial redirection stops and you are returned to the command mode in the Telnet or SSH session.

SerialInterfaceState.description: Specify the enabled and disabled state of the serial interface.

TextFlowType.description: Specify the type of the text stream supported on the serial interface.

title: #LenovoSerialInterface.v1_0_0
